verses.verse: Afterward he brought <S%H7725><s%> me again <S%H7725><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> issued <S%H3318><s%> out from under <S%H8478><s%> the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> eastward: <S%H6921><s%> for the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> stood toward the east, <S%H6921><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> from the right <S%H3233><s%> side of the house, <S%H1004><s%> at the south <S%H5045><s%> side of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then brought <S%H3318><s%> he me out of the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and led <S%H5437><s%> me about <S%H5437><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> to the utter <S%H2351><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> eastward; <S%H6921><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there ran <S%H6379><s%> out waters <S%H4325><s%> on the right <S%H3233><s%> side. <S%H3802><s%>

And when the man <S%H376><s%> that had the line <S%H6957><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> eastward, <S%H6921><s%> he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and he brought <S%H5674><s%> me through <S%H5674><s%> the waters; <S%H4325><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were to the ankles. <S%H657><s%>

Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and brought <S%H5674><s%> me through <S%H5674><s%> the waters; <S%H4325><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were to the knees. <S%H1290><s%> Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and brought <S%H5674><s%> me through; <S%H5674><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were to the loins. <S%H4975><s%>

Afterward he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand; <S%H505><s%> and it was a river <S%H5158><s%> that I could <S%H3201><s%> not pass <S%H5674><s%> over: <S%H5674><s%> for the waters <S%H4325><s%> were risen, <S%H1342><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> to swim <S%H7813><s%> in, a river <S%H5158><s%> that could not be passed <S%H5674><s%> over. <S%H5674><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> have you seen <S%H7200><s%> this? Then he brought <S%H3212><s%> me, and caused me to return <S%H7725><s%> to the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river. <S%H5158><s%>

Now when I had returned, <S%H7725><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> on the one side and on the other. <S%H2088><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he to me, These <S%H428><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> issue <S%H3318><s%> out toward the east <S%H6930><s%> country, <S%H1552><s%> and go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the desert, <S%H6160><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> into the sea: <S%H3220><s%> which being brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into the sea, <S%H3220><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall be healed. <S%H7495><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that every <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H5315><s%> that lives, <S%H2416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> moves, <S%H8317><s%> wherever <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the rivers <S%H5158><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> shall live: <S%H2421><s%> and there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> multitude of fish, <S%H1710><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H428><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> thither: <S%H8033><s%> for they shall be healed; <S%H7495><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> thing shall live <S%H2425><s%> where <S%H413><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> comes. <S%H935><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that the fishers <S%H1728><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> on it from Engedi <S%H5872><s%> even to Eneglaim; <S%H5882><s%> they shall be a place to spread <S%H4894><s%> forth nets; <S%H2764><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%> shall be according to their kinds, <S%H4327><s%> as the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>
But the miry <S%H1207><s%> places thereof and the marshes <S%H1360><s%> thereof shall not be healed; <S%H7495><s%> they shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to salt. <S%H4417><s%>

And by the river <S%H5158><s%> on the bank <S%H8193><s%> thereof, on this <S%H2088><s%> side and on that side, shall grow <S%H5927><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> for meat, <S%H3978><s%> whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall not fade, <S%H5034><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof be consumed: <S%H8552><s%> it shall bring <S%H1069><s%> forth new <S%H1069><s%> fruit <S%H1061><s%> according to his months, <S%H2320><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> they issued <S%H3318><s%> out of the sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall be for meat, <S%H3978><s%> and the leaf <S%H5929><s%> thereof for medicine. <S%H8644><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> shall be the border, <S%H1366><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall have two portions. <S%H2256><s%>

And you shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> it, one <S%H376><s%> as well as another: <S%H251><s%> concerning the which <S%H834><s%> I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to your fathers: <S%H1><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to you for inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the border <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> from the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon, <S%H2855><s%> as men go <S%H935><s%> to Zedad; <S%H6657><s%>

Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> Berothah, <S%H1268><s%> Sibraim, <S%H5453><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%> Hazarhatticon, <S%H2694><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Hauran. <S%H2362><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> from the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be Hazarenan, <S%H2703><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> and the north <S%H6828><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath. <S%H2574><s%> And this is the north <S%H6828><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

And the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> you shall measure <S%H4058><s%> from Hauran, <S%H2362><s%> and from Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> and from Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and from the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from the border <S%H1366><s%> to the east <S%H6931><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%> And this is the east <S%H6921><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

And the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward, <S%H5045><s%> from Tamar <S%H8559><s%> even to the waters <S%H4325><s%> of strife <S%H4808><s%> in Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> to the great <S%H1419><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%> And this is the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward. <S%H5045><s%>

The west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> also shall be the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> from the border, <S%H1366><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> a man come <S%H935><s%> over <S%H5227><s%> against <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5227><s%> Hamath. <S%H2574><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the west <S%H3220><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>
So shall you divide <S%H2505><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to you according to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that you shall divide <S%H5307><s%> it by lot for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to you, and to the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> shall beget <S%H3205><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you: and they shall be to you as born <S%H249><s%> in the country <S%H249><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5307><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you among <S%H8432><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that in what <S%H834><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> the stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojournes, <S%H1481><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> shall you give <S%H5414><s%> him his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
